newstitle: People are flocking to sextech startups ahead of the 'hot vax summer.' VCs are taking note.
aciklama: Half of adult Americans have gotten at least one COVID-19 vaccine, and that could lead to more sex this summer.

newstitle: Berkshire Hathaway's Charlie Munger has doubled down on his criticism of 'disgusting' bitcoin
aciklama: "I think I should say modestly that I think the whole damned development is disgusting and contrary to the interests of civilization," Munger said.

newstitle: Sending them home was the easy part: IT departments are bracing for the challenge of keeping employees safe when they can work anywhere, anytime
aciklama: Companies that bet big on cloud computing and security are much better positioned to evolve with the workforce of the 2020s, executives say.

newstitle: This tiny $4,400 EV with 23 horsepower that can seat 4 is outselling the Tesla Model 3 in China
aciklama: The Wuling Hong Guang Mini EV costs a tenth of the Model 3 in China — and it's selling like hotcakes.

newstitle: US bus companies are poised to reap the rewards of Joe Biden's $174 billion EV plan — if they can crack 3 key challenges
aciklama: Few industries were hit harder by the COVID-19 pandemic than bus companies, but White House plans for electrification could cause it to boom.

newstitle: Elon Musk brainstormed 'SNL' skit ideas on Twitter, including 'Woke' James Bond and 'Irony Man'
aciklama: The upcoming "Saturday Night Live" host and billionaire founder of Tesla and SpaceX brainstormed ideas for sketches, including "Irony Man."

newstitle: Tesla is giving its German team six more months to start production at its Berlin gigafactory
aciklama: Elon Musk's EV company is allowing more time for manufacturing to begin at its first gigafactory in Europe, the German weekly Automobilwoche reported

newstitle: Max Hodak, the cofounder of Elon Musk's Neuralink, departed the company 'a few weeks ago'
aciklama: Hodak, who also served as the company's president, said he remained a huge cheerleader for the venture, following his departure

newstitle: Remote desktop startup Parsec won $25 million in a funding round backed by Andreessen Horowitz using this pitch deck
aciklama: The firm was also backed by Makers Fund and Notion Capital.

newstitle: Warren Buffett says that trimming his Apple stake was 'probably a mistake' — and Charlie Munger told him not to sell
aciklama: The famed investor said his right-hand man only allows him a few missteps, and he used them up selling Costco and Apple shares.

newstitle: A huge rocket from China's space-station launch could fall back to Earth totally uncontrolled
aciklama: China plans 10 more launches to build its space station by the end of 2022. It's not clear whether there's any plan to safely discard the rockets.

newstitle: Experts rank Amazon's self-driving unit, Tesla, Waymo, and 12 other power players in the world of autonomy
aciklama: Waymo was once again a winner in Guidehouse Insight's ranking of the top autonomous-vehicle companies. Tesla was not.

newstitle: This consultant counts Amazon, Walmart, and Facebook among the clients he helps to do LinkedIn better. He breaks down 5 common mistakes on the platform and how to avoid them.
aciklama: LinkedIn has huge potential to generate leads. Aron Tzismas of content strategists Knotch, sets out how to avoid five mistakes other companies.

newstitle: About a third of Basecamp employees quit after the CEO banned politics and shuttered the DEI committee. Some describe an autocratic culture.
aciklama: Basecamp's controversial new policies reflect the cofounders' resistance to dissent, a former employee told Insider.

newstitle: Exclusive: $4.3 billion fintech darling Marqeta is planning an IPO as early as June
aciklama: Sources tell Insider the $4.3 billion payments startup Marqeta is planning to make its IPO filing public on May 14 and targeting a listing in June.

newstitle: The pandemic set an unstoppable cloud force in motion and Amazon, Microsoft, and Google aren't slowing down
aciklama: Digital transformation is in its "golden age" and the cloud will keep booming post-pandemic, experts say, benefitting Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.

newstitle: Investors are trying to turn TikTok stars into movie stars — but the project is doomed to fail
aciklama: A new startup is pouring millions into yet another attempt to bring internet stars to the big screen. But TikTok stars are not movies stars.

newstitle: Googlers fight to stay home and Apple goes to court
aciklama: In this week's edition of the Insider Tech newsletter we look at the latest internal battle at Google: The right to work from home. And get ready for Apple vs Epic!

newstitle: The NYPD has terminated its contract with the maker of a 'creepy' robot dog, following a fierce backlash over its use in policing
aciklama: Amid public outrage, New York officials have scrapped a $94,000 deal with the "Digidog" maker, Boston Dynamics, following a backlash.

newstitle: Elon Musk's pointed jabs at journalists: From shutting down Tesla's media relations offices to accusing reporters of being 'holier than thou'
aciklama: Journalists "should be ashamed of themselves" after coverage of recent Tesla crash, Musk said on a call.

newstitle: Tesla currently has 'no competitors,' but its biggest rivals will come from China, auto-manufacturing expert says
aciklama: When Tesla's true rivals do arrive, they'll be Chinese, manufacturing expert Sandy Munro said in a video on his YouTube channel.

newstitle: In a NASA simulation of an asteroid impact, scientists concluded they couldn't stop a space rock from decimating Europe
aciklama: Space agencies participated in a week-long NASA exercise in which they tried — and failed — to stop a fictitious asteroid from hitting Europe.

newstitle: 4 unanswered questions about the mysterious company that began managing a big chunk of the internet minutes before Biden was sworn in
aciklama: A small unknown company from Florida began overseeing a large portion of the internet owned by the Pentagon, leading to more questions than answers.

newstitle: Starlink could help fund Elon Musk's Mars development plans, according to SpaceX's president
aciklama: Gwynne Shotwell said funding development on the Red Planet meant going into markets bigger "than the one you're in."

newstitle: Celebrities are earning more than $20,000 a month on Swedish Cameo rival Memmo as the business booms
aciklama: Celebrities like Michael Owen, Carole Baskin, and Tori Spelling can earn sums as high as $20,000 on memmo.me.

newstitle: The founder of $2.8 billion Getir explains why investors hope to find the next Uber among 10-minute grocery apps
aciklama: Nazim Salur previously founded a clone of Uber. He's now finding his idea for 10-minute grocery delivery is being widely copied.

newstitle: Amazon was ranked by LinkedIn as the best place to grow your career. But the list omitted major factors like pay and race.
aciklama: LinkedIn weighed factors like promotion rates, skill development, and gender diversity, but salaries and racial diversity weren't among its criteria.

newstitle: Former Netflix executive convicted of fraud after orchestrating more than $500,000 in bribes and kickbacks
aciklama: As Netflix's IT chief, Michael Kail approved contracts with tech startups in exchange for kickbacks, even buying a house with the funds, a jury found.
